properties.name: Grand Canyon
properties.description: One of the most iconic geological formations, carved by the Colorado River.

visiting_info.best_time: March to May, September to November

properties.name: Mount Everest
properties.description: The highest point on Earth, part of the Himalayan orogeny caused by the collision of the Indian and Eurasian plates.

visiting_info.best_time: April to May, September to October

properties.name: Giant's Causeway
properties.description: Interlocking basalt columns formed by an ancient volcanic fissure eruption.

visiting_info.accessibility: Visitor center and coastal walking paths

properties.name: Uluru (Ayers Rock)
properties.description: A massive sandstone monolith in the heart of the Northern Territory's arid 'Red Centre'.

visiting_info.accessibility: Accessible by road and nearby airport
